name: Claydol
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.

poke_power.name: Cosmic Power
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose up to 2 cards from your hand and put them on the bottom of your deck in any order. If you do, draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. This power can’t be used if Claydol is affected by a Special Condition.
